sentence.Network_en: His gauntlets contain a flamethrower, and a whipcord lanyard launcher.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的护手里安装了火焰喷射器和绳索发射器.

sentence.Network_en: So the Flamethrower lit up to take up the slack.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个空缺随即就由“喷火器”顶上了.

list.abs: Adolf Hitler himself wanted Jagdtiger ( s ) to be rebuilt into flamethrower tank ( s ) , but his wish was not fulfilled .希特勒想把“猎虎”改装成喷火坦克，但是它的这个愿望没有实现。

workers use flamethrowers to create the desired effects in film production .在电影制作过程中工作人员用火焰喷射器制造效果。

flamethrower infantry : he is equipped withflamethrowers and has a very small range , butdoes an extremely high amount of damage , evenagainst heavily armored vehicles .火焰喷射器兵:装备一支火焰喷射器,射程很近,但是能造成极大程度的破坏力,尤其在对付重装甲车辆时。

entry.def: A flame-thrower is a gun that can send out a stream of burning liquid and that is used as a weapon or for clearing plants from an area of ground.

means.word_mean: 1. a weapon that squirts ignited fuel for several yards
